question: Which State made Free GST facilitation centres?
explanation: Goa's Office of the Commissioner of Commercial Taxes set up Goods and Service Tax (GST) facilitation centers in ward offices across the state. The chartered accountants will provide free consultation services related to GST between 4-6 pm till the 10 July. The facility will also be available at the Commercial Tax Ward Offices in Panaji, Margao, Mapusa, Ponda and Vasco.
